title: r/Prorevenge My Wife Cheated With 13 Men + 2 Women, So I Ruined Her Life!
description:
r/Prorevenge In today's story, OP has an absolutely terrible wife who cheats on him with 15 different people! She gets blackout drunk around their kids, and she even leaves their two kids (3 and 4 years old) home along so she can go out to parties and hook up with guys. OP enlists the help of one of his wife's friends, who has become disgusted with her behavior, and orchestrates a plan to trap in her web of lies and destroy her future! If you enjoyed this episode, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
